item.description:
Presented by the Ridgefield Liberty Cooperative

Gary Johnson to discuss the OUR AMERICA Initiative.


Both the United States and the state of CT face dire budget deficits that threaten our long term fiscal sustainability. In New Mexico, Governor Johnson brought a common sense approach to governing, eliminating the states budget deficit by cutting the growth of the state government in half while maintaining the longest period in state history without a tax increase. While he is a Republican, Governor Johnson is well known for his progressive stance on drug policy as well as his opposition to the Iraq War.


Event Organizer: Keith Velia
Your rsvp wll go to Keith
We are still finalizing details, our current information is attached. Â 
Keith hopes you can attend on April 2nd.
Ridgefield Country Playhouse, 80 East Ridge


barbara g.
item.name: Former NM Gov. Gary Johnson Speaks- Special Guest Peter Schiff
